#summary Most important parts of the API.

= Most important API parts =

While the [http://jmte.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/doc/index.html  
template language itself] is one part of the _Java Minimal Template Engine_, there is also the API that triggers the transformation and defines how a model is rendered.

= Renderers =

As described in the [http://jmte.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/doc/index.html language specification] renderers control how objects coming from the model as displayed in the result of the template transformation.
